Comments_List: This semester grantsmanship was heavily discussed.
We learned about career development, scientific publications, presentations, next steps, etc.
This course provided a great tour of scholarship and what that looks like at our stage.  I have a greater sense of what I need to be thinking about as I plan these early years in research.
The strength of the class is the intense, personal mentoring.

This was a great class to come together and learn about what we need to begin to pull together as we begin our early careers.  Although it was difficult because everyone in the cohort was at a different stage in his/her research this semester, I do feel like I got a good overview of our early career trajectories.
